---
title: "stop"
description: "Stops the specified agent and clears the last agent response"
---



Retrieves a valid agent identifier using the provided value or the last stored
response, sends a stop request to the API, resets the internal agent response,
and returns the resulting AgentResponse.



## Parameters

<ParamField path="agent_id" type="str" required>
  The identifier of the agent to stop.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="session_id" type="str" required>
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`AgentResponse`](/sdk-reference/misc/agentresponse): The response from the stop operation.

## Raises

- `ValueError`: If a valid agent identifier cannot be determined.
